author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR proposes to replace the `*.501` and `*.502` wfs with the `*.402` one in Alpaka for Phase2. This would also definitely solve https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/45332#issuecomment-2344144773 removing the (deprecated) CUDA wfs.
title: Replace CUDA with Alpaka wf in `relval_2026.py`
